pages.heading: PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT
pages.heading2: Your Idea + Our Expertise = Top Class Product
pages.content1: We turn your business idea into technical reality by putting custom skill sets in place. Our proficient product managers with insightful perception and experience can bridge the gap between business vision and technical understanding. Our customized approach helps you create web applications, mobile applications, chatbots, and custom portals. Our services ensure iterative development using advanced technologies for faster time-to-market, robustness, and scalability.
pages.content2:
STAGES OF PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT


  • Idea & Requirement
    • Planning
  • Designing
    • Development
  • Testing
  • Demo
  • Launch
pages.content3:
TECHNOLOGY STACK


  • Backend: NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, Python (Django and Flask)
  • Frontend: ReactJS, AngularJS, VueJS, HTML5, CSS3
  • Mobile: React Native, Java, Swift, Ionic, Flutter, Kotlin
  • DevOps: AWS, Heroku, Jenkins, Ansible, Zabbix

pages.title: Mobile DEVELOPMENT
pages.heading: Mobile DEVELOPMENT
pages.textclass1: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8 px-4 py-8 mx-auto lg:py-16

pages.content1: Fuel your business with flexible and custom mobile applications developed by us. We ideologize and create apps that can help your business to vouch for higher ROI from the market. Our experts have an in-detail idea about what it takes to build an ideal mobile application tailoring to your business needs. Right from ideating your application requirements to strategizing them, we convert them into significant plans and end up with market dominance. We can help you create digitally transformative, high-performing, and featured-packed cross-platform apps for Android and iOS devices.
pages.content2:
STAGES OF MOBILE APP DEVELOPMENT


  • Research
    • Wireframe
  • Prototype
    • Design
  • Develop
  • Testing
  • Deploy
  • Monitor
pages.content3:
TECHNOLOGY STACK


    iOS app development: : Swift and Objective-C Toolset â€“ Xcode and AppCode
  • Android app development:: Java and Kotlin Toolset- Android Studio
  • Hybrid app development: React Native, Flutter, and Ionic

pages.title: Workflow Automation
pages.heading: Workflow Automation
pages.textclass1: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8 px-4 py-8 mx-auto lg:py-16
pages.textclass2: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8 px-4 py-8 mx-auto lg:py-16
pages.content1: Our team makes work more meaningful, productive, and efficient by automating your business processes. Alvrio Labs enables your organization to manage and optimize your business processes - all with clicks and no code. Now liberate your employees from spending time on repetitive tasks so they can instead focus on high-value, mission-critical work. We use standard practices to integrate and automate workflows for various cloud-based and internal tools
pages.content2:
WE FOLLOW A 3 STEP APPROACH


    Manage:: Unify people, processes, and systems across your organization to drive better business outcomes.
  • Automate: Streamline sophisticated processes with powerful capabilities to advance your business:
  • OptimizeMonitor your automated workflows to ensure they are running at peak performance.

pages.title: Digital Marketing
pages.textclass1: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8 px-4 py-8 mx-auto lg:py-16

pages.textclass3: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8 px-4 py-8 mx-auto lg:py-16
pages.content1: We build your brand name brick by brick through a strategic marketing plan. We help you realize your vision you have for your brand in the digital realm. As per your business requirements, we define your project goals, establish a strategy & timeframe, and determine the KPIs (key performance indicators). Our experts prepare regular reports & updates during the implementation cycle so that you can keep track of the project progress. Our Digital Marketing approach ensures long term gain through organic success and other inbound marketing techniques.
pages.heading: Digital Marketing
pages.content2:
STAGES OF DIGITAL MARKETING


  • GoalDetermination
    • Setting-Up And Defining Your Digital Marketing Strategy
  • Implementation And Traction
    • Conversion And Expansion
  • Target Audience Segmentation
  • Targeting Strategy
  • Beta Roadmap and Results
  • Reporting and Analytics
pages.content3:
DIGITAL MARKETING KNOW HOW


      Paid Marketing
  • Google Ads Adsend: PPC/Keywords/Display
  • Social Advertising:FB/Insta/Twitter/LinkedIn/YouTube
  • Content Marketing
  • E-commerce Marketing
      • Organic SEO
  • On Page SEO: Tags optimization/Keyword Research
  • Off Page SEO: Blogging/Social Media Optimization

pages.title: Data Science
pages.heading: Data Science
pages.textclass1: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8 px-4 py-8 mx-auto lg:py-16
pages.content1: We work closely with business stakeholders to understand various goals and how data can be leveraged to achieve them. We design data modeling processes, create algorithms and predictive models to digest the data available and churn out required insights. We also do MLOps for continuous delivery and automation of data pipelines. We use standard and hybrid learning techniques to train the models and deploy them into production with traceability and versioning
